function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Strategic planning, risk assessment, flexibility in workplace design","category":"Strategic planning and risk assessment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement infection control measures and workplace safety protocols","category":"Infection control measures and workplace safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper implementation of engineering and administrative control measures","category":"Engineering and administrative control measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Alignment of workplace modification plans with core business plans and cre strategies","category":"Strategic alignment and business plans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper implementation of engineering controls and administrative controls","category":"Engineering and administrative control measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular evaluation and adaptation of cre strategies to align with changing business environment","category":"Strategic alignment and business plans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishing proactive monitoring systems for external factors and regular strategic alignment reviews","category":"Strategic alignment and business plans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in training and development programs for real estate management professionals, collaboration with industry experts for knowledge transfer","category":"Training and development programs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop a comprehensive strategic alignment model to encompass all 15 key components.","category":"Strategic alignment and business plans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement workplace redesign strategies to adjust the physical environment to meet business and employee needs.","category":"Workplace redesign strategies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redesign and consolidate workspace, intensify space use through non-territorial offices, and invest in capital improvements to reduce churn time and cost.","category":"Workplace redesign strategies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Review and develop workplace policies, modify workspace, provide management services to adapt to the new normal","category":"Workplace policies and management services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop and implement data collection strategies, conduct empirical research to validate the framework","category":"Data collection and research","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough assessment of real estate portfolios, identification of modification indicators, implementation of workplace redesign for social distancing","category":"Workplace redesign for social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Training and awareness programs for employees, adoption of specific risk control approaches , building system assessment and adaptation, personal hygiene education","category":"Training and awareness programs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting interviews online to eliminate the risk of in-person transmission, implementing strict safety measures if in-person interviews are necessary.","category":"Remote interviews and safety measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and adhering to public health guidelines for workplace interactions, testing and quarantine protocols for interviewees from different locations.","category":"Adherence to public health guidelines","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing a validation process at the end of each interview to confirm accuracy and completeness of information, cross-referencing interview data with other sources for accuracy.","category":"Validation and cross-referencing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing comprehensive risk management strategies, addressing major implementation factors, creating flexible workplace plans","category":"Risk management strategies and flexible workplace plans","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement flexible work policies, invest in remote work technology","category":"Flexible work policies and remote work technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversify project types, establish remote project management capabilities","category":"Remote project management capabilities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement remote work policies, social distancing measures, and regular sanitization protocols.","category":"Remote work policies and safety protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct modifications during off-peak hours, enforce strict health and safety protocols during modifications, and limit the number of workers present during modifications.","category":"Modifications and health/safety protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide ergonomic assessments and guidelines for remote work setups, offer virtual health and wellness programs, and maintain regular communication to address employee concerns.","category":"Remote work support and wellness programs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide training and support for remote work, monitor work performance regularly","category":"Remote work training and performance
